qas.question: What is the name of the largest art gallery in Jiangsu Province?
What type of art does Jiangsu Art Gallery contain?

answers.text: traditional and contemporary art pieces of China

qas.question: What are two smaller galleries in Nanjing?

answers.text: Red Chamber Art Garden and Jinling Stone Gallery

qas.question: What type of exhibitions do Red Chamber Art Garden and Jinling Stone Gallery show?

context: <a0_0>Jiangsu Art Gallery<a0_0/> is the largest gallery in Jiangsu Province, presenting some of the best <a1_0>traditional and contemporary art pieces of China<a1_0/>; many other smaller-scale galleries, such as <a2_0>Red Chamber Art Garden and Jinling Stone Gallery<a2_0/>, also have <a3_0>their own special exhibitions<a3_0/>.
